TopicTitle: [help] How do I animate gimbaled engines?

Articles.Content:
1) how do I animate gimbaled engines?

2) how do I keep my rotation animation on a single axis, in Unity?

Thank you in advance.

-Esk

You don't animate the gimbals. The part config has a definition for the gimbal transform. The game will automatically "move" that transform and any child objects when you gimbal the engines.

You can't limit the gimbal to a single axis with the stock gimbal module, you need to use km gimbal.
